msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩አምላክ፡ ድርሳን፡ ወዜና፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በወርኃ፡ ጥቅምት፡ ወሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ የሃሉ፡ ምስሌነ፡ ዘኢኃሠሠት፡ ነፍስ፡ ዘይትወሐሣ፡ በሕይወታ፡ ኢትረክብ፡ በሰማያት፡ አመ፡ ዕለተ፡ ሞታ፡ ወከመዝ፡ ኮነ፡ ፩ብእሲ፡ ወቦቱ፡ ብዙኅ፡ ዕዳ፡ ዘኢይፈዲ፡ ወኃሠሥዎ፡ ወአኃዝዎ፡ በማዕከለ፡ ዓውድ፡

supportDesc.foliation: Foliation by Ethio-SPaRE, in pencil, in the middle of the bottom margin.

collation.signatures: Crudely decorated quire marks in the middle of the upper margin of the first leaf of each quire.

supportDesc.condition: Many leaves are made of crudely processed and poorly cut parchment with remains of hairs.

handNote.seg: Divine names; three groups of two lines in the incipit page in the incipit of some texts the first two lines, separated by black lines (e.g., , ); incipits of the sub-sections; strings of ʾasmāt (, , , ); two or three text lines on many folia; elements of chapter dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals; elements of the quires marks. Rubrication has been carefully executed is the main hand, after the copying of the main text.
handNote.desc: Careful, somewhat irregular; by a trained scribe. Slender, right sloping script. Slightly divergent downstrokes, horizontal tops. Rounded letter shapes.

item.q: ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘሸቃ፡ በየነ፡ ካህሣይ፡ ወብእሲቱ፡ ወለተ፡ መድኅን፡ ዘወሀብዎ፡ ለታቦተ፡ ሚካኤል፡ አዲ፡ አይመዓት፡ ከመ፡ ይኩዎሙ፡ መርሐ፡ ለመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ስመ፡ ጥምቀቱ፡ ገብረ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ ወአቡሁ፡ ጽጌ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ወእሙ፡ ወለተ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ወብእሲቱ፡ ወለተ፡ መድኅን፡ ወአቡሃ፡ አቡነ፡ ወልደ፡ ኪዳን፡ ወእማ፡ ወለተ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ወደቂቁ፡ ወለተ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወለተ፡ ጻድቃን፡ ዘተጽሐፈ፡ በዘመነ፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ለንጉስነ፡ ኃይለ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ወሊቀ፡ ጳጳስነ፡ ባሰልዮስ፡ በ፶፻ወ፭፻፶ወ፬፡ ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት። ዘሰረቆ፡ ወዘፈሐቆ፡ በሥልጣነ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ወጳውሎስ፡ ውጉዘ፡ ለይኩን።
item.note: In Gǝʿǝz and Amharic. The donor šaqqā Bayyana Kāhśāy and his relatives are mentioned. The note was written during the reign of Emperor Ḫāyla Śǝllāse Iand the tenure of Metropolitan Basǝlyos, but the date mentioned, 5554 year of mercy (=62 CE), seems to be mistaken, unless the year 1962 CE is meant.

item.desc: The note appers to be confirming the payment of the commissioner to the unnamed scribe (the signature of the scribe mentioned in the note is missing).
item.q: ሐምሌ፡ ፳፰ቀን፡ ፶፬፡ ዓ፡ ም፡ ከሸቃ፡ በየን፡ ካህሣይ። የጸሐፊ፡ ፌርማ፡ የመጽሐፉ፡ ዋጋ፡ ዘጠኝ፡ ባውንድ፡ ደርሰኛል፡ ብየ፡ በጽሕፈቴ፡ ፌርማ፡ አራጋግጣለሁኝ፡ ኃይለ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ይሙት።
item.note: The note mentions the price of the book (nine pounds) and the date when the money was paid to the scribe, 28 Ḥamle (19)54 EC (= 4 August 1962 CE).

The name of qašši gabaz Dastā Gabra Madḫǝn, very crudely written in violet ink.

binding.decoNote: Ethiopian binding. Two wooden boards covered with dark brown blind tooled leather. No textile inlays. Four sewing stations. Endbands and endband sewing intact.
Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

history.origin: Probably 1962. The manuscript was commissioned by šaqqā Bayyana Kāhśāy (cp. and , supplications on many folia) and his wife Walatta Madḫən, and written by the scribe and priest Gabra Mikāʾel (see, e.g., , ). The names of other persons, probably šaqqā Bayyana Kāhśāy's relatives, are mentioned in and the supplication formulas (Ṣəge Libānos, e.g., ; Gabra Ḥawāryā, e.g., ; ʾabuna Walda Kidān, e.g., ; Walatta Mikāʾel and Walatta ʾIyasus, ). The church to which the manuscript was initially donated according to Addition 1 is ʾAddi ʾAymaʿāt Mikāʾel.
